request.description: Mark that the user has accepted the terms and conditions and privacy policy. This endpoint should be called after login if the user hasn't accepted the terms yet (termsAccepted is false in login response).
Get the current authenticated user's profile with profile completion percentage and missing fields

response.name: Success Response with Profile Completion

request.description: Update the current user's online or offline status. Set isOnline to true to appear online to other users, or false to appear offline. This status is displayed to other users on the platform.
Get user statistics including total male users, total female users, online male users today, and online female users today. This endpoint is public and does not require authentication.
Get the latest joined users without authentication. Returns only active and email-verified users.
Get user by ID without authentication. Returns user profile data without like status information.
Record a visit to another user's profile. This endpoint is called when viewing a user's profile.
Get profile visit statistics for the current user including total visits and unique visitors count.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get a list of recent visitors to the current user's profile with visitor details.

response.name: Success Response
